awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 nomination.

fullplot: Rachel is a 9-year-old girl who is perfection itself - unless she's crossed or challenged. Several disturbing recent incidents have led Rachel's mother Christine to suspect that her child is a latent murderess. Upon discovering that she herself is the daughter of a convicted killer, Christine becomes convinced that sweet little Rachel is a "bad seed" - an inherent killer who feels no remorse because she doesn't know any better.
plot: Freak fatal accidents force a widow to realize her precocious 9-year-old daughter was born to kill.
title: The Bad Seed
writers: Maxwell Anderson (based upon the play by)
William March (based on the novel by)
